1370: Harlo was born in Die Coninc straet in 1370.
Got married to Mabelie at age 24 in 1370.
1371: Had a daughter with Mabelie, Mabelie, at age 25.
1377: Had a son with Mabelie, Curdiin, at age 31.
1378: Had a daughter with Mabelie, Marie, at age 32.
1379: Had a daughter with Mabelie, Aghete, at age 33.
1380: Lost daughter Marie when Marie was 3 years old.
